item.title: 电子商务公司 Pattern 提交首次公开募股申请，显示收入增长
item.description: Pattern Group Inc.是一家在亚马逊公司等市场上转售商品的电子商务公司，该公司提交了首次公开募股申请，披露了不断增长的收入和利润。【原文：Pattern Group Inc., an e-commerce firm that resells goods on marketplaces such as Amazon.com Inc.’s, filed for an initial public offering, disclosing growing revenue and profit.】

item.title: Meta 将与 Midjourney 合作授权其人工智能实验室的技术
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司与人工智能图像和视频生成器 Midjourney 公司建立了新的合作伙伴关系，使这家科技巨头可以在其模型和产品中使用这家初创公司的 "美学技术"。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. struck a new partnership with artificial intelligence image and video generator Midjourney Inc., giving the tech giant access to the startup’s “aesthetic technology” for its models and products.】

item.title: 以太币涨幅创纪录，突破 2021 年加密货币牛市高点
item.description: 以太币在近四年来首次飙升至创纪录水平，这种第二大加密货币在长期被吹捧为加密货币市场领头羊比特币的适应性更强的替代品之后，受益于需求的复苏。【原文：Ether surged to a record for the first time in almost four years, with the second-largest cryptocurrency benefiting from a renewal in demand after long being touted as a more adaptable alternative to the crypto market leader Bitcoin.】

item.title: 卡尼的关税调整对企业有利，对政治却令人头疼
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）决定取消对从美国进口的许多商品征收的关税，在此之前，加拿大企业和分析人士曾发出一系列警告，称这些征税正在给加拿大造成经济损失。【原文：Prime Minister Mark Carney’s decision to remove many tariffs on imports from the US comes after a series of warnings from businesses and analysts that the levies were inflicting economic damage on Canada.】

item.title: 因预算赤字，穆迪将奥地利评级展望降至负面
item.description: 穆迪投资者服务公司（Moody's Investors Service）将奥地利的主权信用展望下调至负面，这是奥地利政府修补财政状况的努力遭遇的最新挫折。【原文：Austria’s sovereign credit outlook was cut to negative by Moody’s Investors Service in the latest setback for the government’s efforts to mend its finances.】

item.title: 巴拉圭央行将利率维持在 6%，通胀前景温和
item.description: 巴拉圭中央银行将基准利率维持在 6% 不变，并表示预计今年下半年通货膨胀率将保持在目标范围内。【原文：Paraguay’s central bank kept its benchmark interest unchanged at 6%, saying it expects inflation will stay within its target range the rest of this year.】

item.title: 鲍威尔在杰克逊霍尔发出的利率信号只适合一次降息
item.description: 在意见分歧的美联储中，在周五主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）为 9 月份降息敞开大门之后，推动降息的决策者们似乎即将如愿以偿。【原文：At a divided Federal Reserve, policymakers pushing for lower interest rates look close to getting their way after Chair Jerome Powell on Friday opened the door to a cut in September.】

item.title: 特朗普宣布对家具进口进行调查，并准备征收关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，美国正在对进入美国的家具进行 "重大关税调查"，为针对特定行业的征税创造条件。【原文：President Donald Trump said the US is conducting a “major Tariff Investigation on Furniture coming into the United States,” setting the stage for industry-specific levies.】

item.title: 盈余逼近，对冲基金将看涨石油的押注降至 17 年低点
item.description: 由于对俄罗斯原油实施更多制裁的风险减弱，对冲基金将看涨原油的头寸降至约17年来的最低点，从而使全球供应过剩的担忧再次凸显。【原文：Hedge funds slashed their bullish position on crude to the lowest in about 17 years as risks of additional sanctions on Russian crude waned, bringing concerns about a global supply glut back to the fore.】

item.title: 杰克逊霍尔八大收获

item.title: 农作物巡回考察发现玉米产量创纪录，但高温和病害是风险所在
item.description: 根据 Pro Farmer 周五在其年度作物巡查结束后发布的最终估计，美国玉米单产有望在即将到来的收获季节创下历史新高，但高温和疾病的影响可能会影响结果。【原文：US corn yields are expected to reach a record high for the upcoming harvest, though the impact of hot temperatures and diseases may affect the outcome, according to final estimates released Friday by Pro Farmer following the end of its annual crop tour.】

item.title: 道琼斯工业指数创下今年首个收盘纪录
item.description: 在跨资产大涨的推动下，道琼斯工业平均指数（Dow Jones Industrial Average）自 12 月份以来首次创下历史新高，因为这一稳健的蓝筹股指数终于赶上了股市中风险较高的股票。【原文：A blistering cross-asset rally drove the Dow Jones Industrial Average to close at an all-time high for the first time since December as the staid blue-chip gauge finally caught up to the riskier corners of the stock market.】

item.title: 鲍威尔讲话后股市大涨，VIX 指数降至圣诞夜以来最低水平
item.description: 上周五，Cboe 波动率指数（VIX）跌至年内最低水平，原因是美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）发表了备受期待的讲话，为 9 月份降息提供了支持，美股因此大涨。【原文：The Cboe Volatility Index (VIX) fell to its lowest level of the year on Friday, as US stocks surged following a highly-anticipated speech from Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell that bolstered the case for a September interest-rate cut.】

item.description: 我们还在杰克逊霍尔参加堪萨斯城联邦储备银行的年度经济研讨会，刚刚聆听了美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔的重要讲话。这次演讲为 9 月降息打开了大门，对市场来说是一个鸽派的惊喜，股市也因此飙升。但为什么鲍威尔决定把重点放在他所认为的劳动力市场的 "下行 "风险上，而不是通胀的 "上行 "风险上呢？在本期节目中，我们采访了彭博社电视台的迈克尔-麦基（Michael McKee）。【原文：We’re still at the Kansas City Federal Reserve Bank’s annual economic symposium in Jackson Hole, where we just heard Fed Chair Jerome Powell’s big speech. item.description: 视频游戏巨头暴雪娱乐公司（Blizzard Entertainment）的联合创始人迈克-莫海姆（Mike Morhaime）本周给他的新公司 Dreamhaven 的员工写了一封信，他希望自己不必写这封信。【原文：Mike Morhaime, a co-founder of video-game giant Blizzard Entertainment, sent a letter to staff at his new company Dreamhaven this week that he wished he didn’t have to write.】

item.title: 银行交易受阻后，Blackstone 接洽 Justrite 债务事宜

item.title: 苹果称前员工和中国 OPPO 窃取商业机密
item.description: 苹果公司在一桩诉讼中指控智能手机制造商Oppo高薪挖走了Apple Watch团队的一名成员，并怂恿他在中国公司的新工作中窃取商业机密。【原文：Apple Inc. accused smartphone maker Oppo in a lawsuit of poaching a highly paid member of the Apple Watch team and encouraging him to steal trade secrets for his new job with the Chinese firm.】

On Aug. 22, Trump escalated his campaign against the Fed’s indepen】

item.title: 勒索软件黑客攻击橙色电信，数据在暗网上公布
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，一个黑客犯罪团伙窃取了法国电信公司 Orange SA 的商业客户数据，并将其发布到网上。【原文：A criminal hacking gang has stolen business customer data from French telecommunications company Orange SA and posted it online, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: MEG Energy 股东将投票反对 Cenovus 的收购
item.description: 斯特拉斯科纳资源有限公司（Strathcona Resources Ltd.）创始人亚当-沃特乌斯（Adam Waterous）表示，他的公司将投票反对Cenovus能源公司（Cenovus Energy Inc.【原文：Strathcona Resources Ltd. founder Adam Waterous said his company will vote against Cenovus Energy Inc.’s acquisition of MEG Energy Corp., saying the oil sands producer’s board accepted an inferior offer in an attempt to thwart his own bid.】

item.title: 特朗普将于周五公布英特尔股权交易方案
item.description: 熟悉该计划的人士称，特朗普政府和英特尔公司准备在周五公布一项协议的细节，该协议将让美国政府获得这家芯片制造商的股权。【原文：The Trump administration and Intel Corp. are poised to announce details on Friday of an agreement to give the US government an equity stake in the chipmaker, people familiar with the plan say.】

item.title: 苹果探索使用谷歌双子座人工智能为改版 Siri 提供支持
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc. ）正在就使用谷歌双子座（Google Gemini）为改良版 Siri 语音助手提供动力进行早期讨论，这标志着该公司可能向外包更多人工智能技术迈出关键一步。【原文：Apple Inc. is in early discussions about using Google Gemini to power a revamped version of the Siri voice assistant, marking a key potential step toward outsourcing more of its artificial intelligence technology.】

item.title: 机构称洛杉矶和三藩市枢纽对加州高速铁路至关重要
item.description: 根据一份新的机构审查报告，加州高速铁路管理局预计将于 2032 年开始在拖延已久的旧金山至洛杉矶线路的中央山谷段提供客运服务，这比监察长之前的报告估计的时间至少提前了一年。【原文：The California High-Speed Rail Authority expects to begin passenger service on the Central Valley segment of its long-delayed San Francisco-to-Los Angeles line by 2032, at least a year earlier than a previous Inspector General report estimated, according to a new agency review.】
